de.tum.in.tumcampus.auxiliary

Class SwipeDismissList

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tum.in.tumcampus.auxiliary.SwipeDismissList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnTouchListener

    public final class SwipeDismissList
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    A View.OnTouchListener that makes the list items in a ListView dismissable. ListView is given special treatment because by default it handles touches for its list items... i.e. it's in charge of drawing the pressed state (the list selector), handling list item clicks, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SwipeDismissList.OnDismissCallback
      The callback interface used to inform the client about a successful dismissal of one or more list item positions.
      (package private) class  SwipeDismissList.PendingDismissData 
      static interface  SwipeDismissList.SwipeDismissDiscardable 
      static class  SwipeDismissList.Undoable
      An implementation of this abstract class must be returned by the SwipeDismissList.OnDismissCallback.onDismiss(android.widget.AbsListView, int) method, if the user should be able to undo that dismiss.
      static class  SwipeDismissList.UndoMode
      Defines the mode a SwipeDismissList handles multiple undos.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SwipeDismissList(android.widget.AbsListView listView, SwipeDismissList.OnDismissCallback callback)
      Constructs a new swipe-to-dismiss touch listener for the given list view.

      Methods

      void cancelUndo()
      Clears the undo actions list without discarding
      void discardUndo()
      Discard all stored undos and hide the undo popup dialog.

      Sets the time in milliseconds after which the undo popup automatically disappears.

      Sets whether another touch on the view is required before the popup counts down to dismiss.
      void setSwipeDisabled(boolean disabled)
      Enable/disable swipe.

      Sets the string shown in the undo popup, when SwipeDismissList.UndoMode is set to SwipeDismissList.UndoMode.MULTI_UNDO or SwipeDismissList.UndoMode.COLLAPSED_UNDO and multiple deletions has been stored for undo.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwipeDismissList

        public SwipeDismissList(android.widget.AbsListView listView,
                SwipeDismissList.OnDismissCallback callback)
        Constructs a new swipe-to-dismiss touch listener for the given list view.
        Parameters:
        listView - The list view whose items should be dismissable.
        callback - The callback to trigger when the user has indicated that she would like to dismiss one or more list items.

    • Method Detail

      • setAutoHideDelay

        public void setAutoHideDelay(int delay)
        Sets the time in milliseconds after which the undo popup automatically disappears.
        Parameters:
        delay - Delay in milliseconds.

      • setUndoString

        public void setUndoString(java.lang.String msg)
        Sets the string shown in the undo popup. This will only show if the SwipeDismissList.Undoable returned by the SwipeDismissList.OnDismissCallback returns null from its SwipeDismissList.Undoable.getTitle() method.
        Parameters:
        msg - The string shown in the undo popup.

      • setUndoMultipleString

        public void setUndoMultipleString(java.lang.String msg)
        Sets the string shown in the undo popup, when SwipeDismissList.UndoMode is set to SwipeDismissList.UndoMode.MULTI_UNDO or SwipeDismissList.UndoMode.COLLAPSED_UNDO and multiple deletions has been stored for undo. If this string contains one %d inside, this will be filled by the numbers of stored undos.
        Parameters:
        msg - The string shown in the undo popup for multiple undos.

      • setRequireTouchBeforeDismiss

        public void setRequireTouchBeforeDismiss(boolean require)
        Sets whether another touch on the view is required before the popup counts down to dismiss. By default this is set to true.
        Parameters:
        require - Whether a touch is required before starting the auto-dismiss timer.

      • discardUndo

        public void discardUndo()
        Discard all stored undos and hide the undo popup dialog.

        Clears the undo actions list without discarding
